akn:subsection.akn:heading: Preparation by Task Force for ten-year program; purposes

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Preparation by Task Force for ten-year program; purposes The Task Force shall prepare a comprehensive research plan for the ten-year program (hereafter in this subchapter referred to as the “comprehensive plan”), setting forth a coordinated program (1) to identify the causes and effects of acid precipitation and (2) to identify actions to limit or ameliorate the harmful effects of acid precipitation.

(d) Convening of Task Force The Task Force shall convene as necessary, but no less than twice during each fiscal year of the ten-year period covered by the comprehensive plan.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Submission of annual report to President and Congress by Task Force

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Submission of annual report to President and Congress by Task Force The Task Force shall submit to the President and the Congress by January 15 of each year an annual report which shall detail the progress of the research program under this subchapter and which shall contain such recommendations as are developed under subsection (b)(14).
